商品名稱: Dokotoo 女款花卉印花襯衫 圓領罩衫泡泡袖襯衫 休閒娃娃裝上衣
留言內容: The blouses (I bought one longsleeved and one short sleeved.  I cannot leave a review on the short sleeved blouse because it is no longer on the website.  I wonder if it was because of the button and elastic and button c,ksjre.  They are difficult to attach to each other, a d the short sleeved blouse closure broke the second time I put it on.  The elastic closure  isn’t the best option for the closure.  Fabric may have added a bit to the cost of the blouse but would have been easier to attach and probably would not have broken loose so quickly.  My time to return it has passed so now I have to figure out how to fix it so it’s easier to put on.  Other than that, this style of blouse is great!  It doesnt wrinkle, the fabric is soft and the style is very cute!  ,

留言內容: This top has a very feminine soft look to it.  The purple is a great lilac color.  It has a rayon feel to the material.  The arms gave elastic with a ruffle.  The elastic is not real fitted.

商品名稱: Dokotoo 女款花卉印花襯衫 圓領罩衫泡泡袖襯衫 休閒娃娃裝上衣

留言內容: Was looking for a cute, easy blouse to wear for work. This one is perfect. I usually buy a size M and this one is just a little on the big side. I am large busted and always worry about fit. I could have gotten a small so if you are in-between, size down. The sleeves are puffy but the elastic isn't too binding and the bodice is flowy without being baggy. I would definitely purchase again.

商品名稱: Dokotoo 女款花卉印花襯衫 圓領罩衫泡泡袖襯衫 休閒娃娃裝上衣

商品名稱: Dokotoo 女款花卉印花襯衫 圓領罩衫泡泡袖襯衫 休閒娃娃裝上衣

商品名稱: Dokotoo 女款花卉印花襯衫 圓領罩衫泡泡袖襯衫 休閒娃娃裝上衣
SKU: 尺寸: X-Large顏色: 1 黑色
留言內容: I also have this in pink.  I chose to size up from what I would normally buy. I’m normally a large depending on the cut of the top. If you want this to be baggy, go up. If you want it to be loose, but tailored, get your regular size. I sit all day and don’t like things to be tight around my middle. If I wasn’t buying it for work, I would probably go with the large.  Definitely has great stretch. Washed up nicely. I’ve had several compliments on the pink and white one so I bought this one also.
